segments.text: My attention is drawn to the left side of the room now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy, quite adventurous by the looks of it, perched precariously on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching to reach into that "COOKIE JAR" in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, he's got one hand in there, grabbing something delicious!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balance seems so unsteady; the stool is practically tipping over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see its legs splayed out at an alarming angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And a little girl is standing right beside him, eagerly reaching up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly waiting for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together in this clandestine operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood scene of forbidden treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope that stool doesn't completely give way under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look so intent on their mission, utterly absorbed.
segments.speaker: PAR
